text: Jesper Gunnar Fernando Nyholm (born 10 September 1993) is a Swedish professional footballer who plays as a defender for Swedish Allsvenskan club Djurgårdens IF. His mother is from the Philippines. ==International career== In early March 2017, he was contacted by the Philippine Football Federation regarding playing for the Philippines national team. A month later, Nyholm revealed that upon speaking with his club coach Rikard Norling, he was told that he had great potential and should wait for the possibility to play for the Swedish national team. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- | rowspan="3" valign="center" |IK Sirius |2011 | rowspan="2" valign="center" |Division 1 |2||0||0 |0|| colspan="2" |—||2||0 |- |2012 |2 |0 |1 |0 | colspan="2" |— |3 |0 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !4!!0!!1 !0!! colspan="2" |— !5!!0 |- | rowspan="3" valign="center" |Gamla Upsala SK |2013 | rowspan="2" valign="center" |Division 2 |16||0||0||0|| colspan="2" |—||16||0 |- |2014 |19||1||0||0|| colspan="2" |—||19||1 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !35!!1!!0!!0!! colspan="2" |—!!35!!1 |- | rowspan="3" |Dalkurd FF |2015 |Division 1 |25 |1 |2 |0 | colspan="2" |— |27 |1 |- |2016 |Superettan |29 |1 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |— |29 |1 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !54 !2 !2 !0 ! colspan="2" |— !56 !2 |- |AIK |2017 |Allsvenskan |7 |1 |0 |0 |0 |0 |7 |1 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !100!!4!!3!!0!!0 !0!!103!!4 |} ==References== == External links == * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish footballers Category:Swedish people of Filipino descent Category:Association football defenders Category:IK Sirius Fotboll players Category:Dalkurd FF players Category:AIK Fotboll players Category:Superettan players Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Sportspeople from Uppsala
